name: The Flock (itch) (Brain in a Bowl)
description:
Beware... the Flock!

Vaguely inspired by the Hitchcock movie The Birds, made for Mini Jam 99 with the theme "Birds". I didn't get around to implementing an endgame or goal, so for now it's just you surviving against the birds. No sound or music yet either, but I did have a lot of fun implementing the bird physics.

How to play

Arrow keys to move, [x] to temporarily scare away the birds. Buildings will give you two seconds of respite before the birds get in.
